description:
Howie is a 25-year-old straight boy who drives trucks for a living.
When he told me what he did, I imagined him sitting at the wheel of a big rig, stopping every once in a while for pie and coffee and then heading back to the cab to jerk one off in that little bed area behind the driver's compartment.
"No," he laughed when I told him. "I just drive small delivery trucks around town."
It's probably better that way. I've seen the loads Howie shoots and even on a short haul that little bed area would get messy pretty fast!
He just got out of a three-year relationship with his girlfriend and has been busy playing the field. "Hit it and split it," as he described it.
He's got nice hairy pecs, beautiful eyes, and a smile that would charm the pants off anyone!
title: Howie
